bug.author: myungjoo
bug.summary: [Bug] Often GstCaps is assumed to have only one GstStructure
bug.description: Often, in the code, we assume that a GstCaps may have a single instance of GstStructure. Although it is true for most cases, it is sometimes not true. We need to fix them. They are potentially dangerous.

comments.comment: : Thank you for posting issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/issues/1876>#1876</denchmark-link> . The person in charge will reply soon.
To check the caps is fixed (gst_caps_is_fixed()), it should have only one structure.
